topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557159cc636872559b622200#post_557159cc636872559b622200
Eh; I didn't cringe cause I've seen way worse.

The problem with Duke Nukem Forever was that it was essentially half finished and just stacked on top of old projects. . . I'm not joking about that.  When it was originally shoved in the garbage can when they took the project out of the garbage can rather than making it fresh they literally made the game on top of the old half finished game.  It's *LITERALLY* a video game from ten years ago just with better 3d models.

The game might have been good if the studio went, "We can't take a ten year old game and just update the models!  We need to remake everything completely!"

If you bought the game you *literally* bought a ten year old game just with updated 3d models.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
